description: Edge cases and difficult scenarios where the agent couldn't determine the proper classification

categories.ambiguous-classification: Classes that could be component, variant, state, or miscellaneous
categories.legacy-patterns: Old patterns that don't follow current conventions
categories.complex-selectors: Selectors with multiple classes that are hard to classify
categories.missing-context: Classes that need more context to classify properly
categories.framework-specific: Classes that might be framework-specific but unclear

notes: This file collects test cases that were skipped because the agent couldn't determine the proper classification. Each case should include the selector, reasoning, and suggested action for manual review.
